org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.lcsim

Class EventDisplayOutputDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.lcsim.EventDisplayOutputDriver

  • public class EventDisplayOutputDriver
extends Driver
    EventDisplayOutputDriver writes the results from clustering and hit reconstruction into a text format that can be read offline by the event display.

      • setIgnoreEmptyEvents

        public void setIgnoreEmptyEvents(boolean ignoreEmptyEvents)
        Sets whether events with no hits should be output.
        Parameters:
        ignoreEmptyEvents - - true indicates that events without hits will be skipped while false indicates that they will be output.

      • setIgnoreNoClusterEvents

        public void setIgnoreNoClusterEvents(boolean ignoreNoClusterEvents)
        Sets whether events with no clusters should be output.
        Parameters:
        ignoreNoClusterEvents - - true indicates that events without clusters will be skipped while false indicates that they will be output.

      • setOutputFileName

        public void setOutputFileName(String outputFileName)
        Sets the name of the output file containing the event data.
        Parameters:
        outputFileName - - The name of the output file.

      • setOutputClusters

        public void setOutputClusters(boolean outputClusters)
        Sets whether clusters should be output to data file,
        Parameters:
        outputClusters - - true indicates that clusters will be written and false that they will not.
